fields.headline: What's on when
fields.bodyText: Covent Garden Festival Date: May 12 - June 2 Location: Covent Garden, London W1. Description: Music in some unusual indoor and outdoor venues - this year Trial by Jury in the Royal Courts of Justice. Contact: 020-7369 1793. Website: www.cgf.co.uk/ Fiesta de San Isidro Date: May 14-20 Location: Madrid, Spain. Description: Free music, dance and performing arts events all over the city. Website: www.whatsonwhen.com/pages/madrid.jml Memphis in May Date: May 4-27. Location: Memphis, Tennessee, US. Description: A month of cultural events, including the Barbecuing World Championships, the Beale Street Music Festival and an International Week of cultural exchanges. Contact: 001 901 542 4004 ex 9570. Website: www.memphisinmay.org/ Cormorant Fishing Date: May 11 - October 15. Location: Nagara River, Gifu City, Honshu, Japan. Description: It's the season when fishermen practise the art of ukai - sending tame cormorants to catch fish. Contact: 0081 (0) 582 62 0104 Website: www.whatsonwhen.com/pages/spectacle.jml
